txt.en: 'Okwô-kuryô protect the forest from invaders. Ghûrdhos cover Okwô-kuryô in vines. Statues then trapped. Lose ability to protect Drúadan Forest. Help us take vines away.'
Remove corrupted vines from Púkel-men statues ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ghân-buri-Ghân, chieftain of the Drúedain, asks of you to remove vines from some of the Púkel-men statues in the Drúadan Forest.
'Okwô-kuryô thank you. Drúedain thank you. Forest is now safer.'
Corrupted vines can be found around some of the Púkel-men statues in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should remove corrupted vines from Púkel-men statues.
Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
